data: NIA SANE Sexual Assault
Status
Nurse Independent Activity
This PowerPlan is for use by  Sexual Assault Nurse Examiners who are part of a SANE designated program
Refer to Decision Support Tool (DST): RN SANES Dispensing HIV Post-Exposure Prophylaxis (PEP) After Sexual Assault
Refer to Decision Support Tool (DST): RN SANES Dispensing Prophylaxis for STI after Sexual Assault
If patient is pregnant or breastfeeding refer to provider for antimicrobial management
Patient Care
POC Urine Pregnancy Test
once
Medications
For gonorrhea and chlamydia coverage
For non-pregnant and pregnant adults, select ceFIXime AND azithromycin
ceFIXime (kit supply)
800 mg, PO, once, drug form: tab, first dose: NOW
azithromycin (kit supply)
1 g, PO, once, drug form: tab, first dose: NOW
If penicillin and/or cephalosporin allergic, select azithromycin (concomitant anti-emetics recommended)
azithromycin (kit supply)
2 g, PO, once, drug form: tab, first dose: NOW
If macrolide allergic, but not pregnant, select ceFIXime AND doxycycline
ceFIXime (kit supply)
800 mg, PO, once, drug form: tab, first dose: NOW
doxycycline (kit supply)
100 mg, PO, once, drug form: cap, first dose: NOW
doxycycline (BCCDC 14 cap) 100 mg
100 mg, PO, as directed, drug form: kit, Dispense Take Home Medication, dispense qty: 1 kit
Patient may require spectinomycin if allergic to penicillin, macrolide and tetracycline. Please consult BCCDC
Contact BC Centre for Excellence in HIV/AIDS (BC-CfE) 1-888-511-6222 if uncertain about whether or not to initiate post-exposure prophylaxis
BC Centre for Excellence in HIV/AIDS (BC-CfE) HIV Post-Exposure Prophylaxis Guidelines
HIV exposure kit
1 kit, PO, as directed, drug form: kit, Dispense Take Home Medication, Dispense qty: 1 kit
tenofovir disoproxil fumarate (kit supply)
300 mg, PO, once, drug form: tab, first dose: NOW
lamiVUDine (kit supply)
150 mg, PO, once, drug form: tab, first dose: NOW
raltegravir (kit supply)
400 mg, PO, once, drug form: tab, first dose: NOW
Instruct patient to follow up with GP for follow up care and ongoing prophylaxis
Refer to Emergency Contraceptive Pills (ECP) Provision of Progestin Only ECP (Adults & Youth)
levonorgestrel
1.5 mg, PO, once, drug form: tab, first dose: NOW
dimenhyDRINATE
50 mg, PO, once, drug form: tab, first dose: NOW
dimenhyDRINATE
50 mg, PO, q6h, PRN nausea or vomiting, drug form: tab, Dispense Take Home Medication, dispense qty: 2 tab
